title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-4.2 - Standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-4.2 - Standards

State Regulations
(a) Total
fluorides, parts per million (ppm), dry weight basis (as F) in and on forage
for consumption by grazing ruminants. Average concentration shall be less than
the following statewide: (1)

For growing
season (not to exceed six consecutive months) - 40 ppm
(2)

For any 60 day period - 60 ppm
(3)

For any 30 day period - 80
ppm
(b) Gaseous fluorides
in air (parts per million parts of air) as F- statewide. (25 degrees

Centigrade, 760 mm Hg.)
(1)
12 hour averages
to be less than 4.5 ppb (3.7 µg/m
3
)
(2)
24 hour averages to be less than 3.5 ppb
(2.85 µg/m
3
)
(3)
1 week averages to be less than 2.0 ppb
(1.65 µg/m
3
)
(4)
1 month averages to be less than 1.0 ppb
(0.8 µg/m
3
)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
257-4.2

Renumbered from 257-8.3

New

York State Register November 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 48, eff. 12/7/2019

Amended

New

York State Register January 17, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 3, eff. 1/26/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
